snippet.name: vision_yaw
snippet.equation:
V1 = $$/mavros/vision_pose/pose/pose/orientation/w$$ V2 = $$/mavros/vision_pose/pose/pose/orientation/x$$ V3 = $$/mavros/vision_pose/pose/pose/orientation/y$$ V4 = $$/mavros/vision_pose/pose/pose/orientation/z$$
return quaternionToYaw(V2, V3, V4, V1)*180/3.1417;

snippet.name: Quat to RPY
snippet.equation:
V1 = $$/mavros/local_position/pose/pose/orientation/w$$ V2 = $$/mavros/local_position/pose/pose/orientation/x$$ V3 = $$/mavros/local_position/pose/pose/orientation/y$$ V4 = $$/mavros/local_position/pose/pose/orientation/z$$
return quaternionToYaw(V1, V2, V3, V4)*180/3.1417;

snippet.name: local_yaw
snippet.equation:
V1 = $$/mavros/local_position/pose/pose/orientation/w$$ V2 = $$/mavros/local_position/pose/pose/orientation/x$$ V3 = $$/mavros/local_position/pose/pose/orientation/y$$ V4 = $$/mavros/local_position/pose/pose/orientation/z$$
return quaternionToYaw(V2, V3, V4, V1)*180/3.1417;

snippet.name: 1st_derivative
snippet.equation:
dx = time - prevX dy = value - prevY prevX = time prevY = value
return dy/dx

snippet.name: 1st_order_lowpass
snippet.equation:
prevY = alpha * value + (1.-alpha) * prevY
return prevY

snippet.name: 2D_velocity
snippet.global: var prev_x = 0 var prev_y = 0 var prev_t = 0
snippet.equation:
X = $$your_odometry/position/x$$ Y = $$your_odometry/position/y$$
var dist = sqrt( (X-prev_x)*(X-prev_x) + (Y-prev_y)*(Y-prev_y) ) var dT = time - prev_t
prev_x = X prev_y = Y prev_t = time
return dist / dT

snippet.name: remove_offset
yaw_from_quaternion
